<h2 style="text-align: center; font-family: 'Moon Dance', cursive; font-size: 3rem; color: rgb(130, 73, 32); margin: 2rem 0; border-bottom: 0px;">The HOMI Mission</h2>

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card .h-100 style="background-color: #e6f3ff;"}
::: {.card-body}
### Promote research and exploration

We support and conduct original research into primary sources, manuscripts, and artifacts related to Indian mathematics, encouraging scholarly exploration and academic discourse.
:::
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card .h-100 style="background-color: #e8f7e8;"}
::: {.card-body}
### Inspire education and engagement

We develop educational resources, workshops, and outreach programs to engage students, teachers, and the general public with the rich heritage of Indian mathematics, making it accessible and relevant.
:::
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card .h-100 style="background-color: #fffde8;"}
::: {.card-body}
### Build a community of scholars

We foster a collaborative network of researchers, educators, and enthusiasts dedicated to the study and promotion of Indian mathematical traditions, facilitating knowledge exchange and mentorship.
:::
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
::: {.card .h-100 style="background-color: #f0e6ff;"}
::: {.card-body}
### Preserve and share knowledge resources

We work to digitize, translate, and make accessible important mathematical texts and resources from India's past, ensuring their preservation for future generations.
:::
:::
:::
